Articles.Content:
Just some stuff i've been working on. If you wonder where the ME-163 parts that i was working on are, sorry, i won't continue those in a long while!

Separation Solutions:

It adds a few different types of sepratrons and parts with sepratrons attached. It currently includes a decoupler-sepratron mix, and a nosecone-sepratron thing, really useful for when part count is limited (Because of LAG).

I plan on having atleast 3 parts in order to release it, so ideas AND feedback are REALLY useful!

Plans:

2.5m versions of the current parts.

Screens:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: Separation Solutions

(Yea its called SepratronPlus, i'll change that name later... )

3.75m Propulsion Module MEFT-1:

As i saw we were lacking small engines for 3.75m parts, i made this all-in-one upper stage module. It packs 400kN of thrust and has a high-ish ISP (Do not remember the exact number right now), i may need to balance it out...

("MEFT" means Mixed Engine and Fuel-Tank BTW)

Screens of it:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: MEFT-1

Uhh yea, its not really organized inside of a "Parts" folder, its really an extra currently, but that will change SOONÃ¢â€žÂ¢... It works though!

Excuse my crappy texturing and average moddeling!

Nice. I had been looking for a standalone separatron nosecone. The decoupler's nice too.

Grabbing it.

P.S. You could rename the Separatron parts as Lawyertrons, lol.

Glad you liked it!

Nice ideas you have there, im going to see if i can make them (Should be able to) and then add them to the mod. Thanks!

The nosecone works like a charm.

Haven't had the occasion of using the stack decoupler, though. I don't have much use for it really.

P.S. The cone could use a bit of colored texture so you can more easily tell the way it's supposed to face.

The stack decoupler could be used for de-orbiting stages when already in orbit, not really sure if its worth, but that people that hate debris may find it useful

Finished the slow burning radial sepratron and the really fast burning sepratron, they need a few tweaks but are ready to use. Will upload them when i finish with the 2.5m nosecone. Will make a new model for it and the 1.25m one, im not sure if i like the way they look right now
